definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: She gave me the name of the nursing home, and I called the number.
sentences.chinese: 她给了我养老院的名字，我拨通了电话。

sentences.english: He was just beginning to grow accustomed to the institutionalisation which his relatives had kindly condemned him.
sentences.chinese: 他已经开始适应那种养老院的生活。

sentences.english: The Home for Aged Persons is at Marengo , some fifty miles from Algiers.
sentences.chinese: 养老院在马朗戈，离阿尔及尔八十公里。

sentences.english: In Minamisoma, in Fukushima Prefecture, 97 residents of aretirement home were found dead.
sentences.chinese: 在福岛县南相马，在一个养老院里发现了97名死者。

sentences.english: She moved into a nursing home after breaking her hip about three years ago.
sentences.chinese: 大约三年前髋骨骨折后她就搬进了养老院。

sentences.english: Hannah had to place her mother in a nursing home years ago.
sentences.chinese: 几年前，汉纳把她母亲送到了养老院。

sentences.english: You can cast your vote at your hospital, maternity home or rest home.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在您的医院，留产院或养老院投你的票。

sentences.english: Volunteer from Tangshan contributes a lot to the nursing house.
sentences.chinese: 来自唐山的义工们为养老院做出了很多贡献。

sentences.english: These students(volunteer) (to) (use) (their) (free) (time) to help the old peple in old people's homes.
sentences.chinese: 这些学生自愿用他们的空闲时间去帮组养老院的老人。

sentences.english: When granny has become so infirm that she can no longer make a cup of tea, she may be nudged into a care home.
sentences.chinese: 当老奶奶虚弱到不能倒茶时，会有人劝她住养老院。

sentences.english: Alerts are sent via text message or over the institution's paging system .
sentences.chinese: 失禁警报通过文字信息或养老院的传呼系统发送出去。

sentences.english: The red-roof houses belong to an old people's home.
sentences.chinese: 那座红顶房子属于一家养老院。

sentences.english: Nursing homes have old man because of depression and suicide Fang Qiong heart very afflictive.
sentences.chinese: 养老院有老人因抑郁症自杀，方琼的心里很难受。

sentences.english: Furthermore, we can visit a nursing home and discover all the wisdom there.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我们还可以拜访养老院，发掘那里的所有智慧。

definition: home of respect for aged/nursing home
to provide for the elderly (family members)/to enjoy a life in retirement
old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents
